T01n893u_001:2: ūṃ ūṃ ūṃ ugracaṇḍaṃ cacakitacakitaṃ caṃcarā(lā)
T01n893u_001:4: hū hū hūṃkārarūpaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ khaṅgapāśān dharantam |
T01n893u_001:5: daṃ daṃ daṃ daṇḍapāṇiṃ ḍamaruḍimiḍimāṃ ḍaṇḍamānaṃ bhramantaṃ
T01n893u_001:6: bhraṃ bhraṃ bhraṃ bhrāntanetraṃ jayatu vijayate siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 1 ||
T01n893u_001:7: ghraṃ ghraṃ ghraṃ ghorarūpaṃ ghughuritaghuritaṃ ghargharīnādaghoṣaṃ
T01n893u_001:8: huṃ huṃ huṃ hāsyarūpaṃ tribhuvanadharitaṃ khecaraṃ kṣetrapālam |
T01n893u_001:9: bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhūtanāthaṃ sakalajanahitaṃ tasya dehā (?) piśācaṃ
T01n893u_001:10: hū hū hūṃkāranādaiḥ sakalabhayaharaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 2 ||
T01n893u_001:11: vraṃ vraṃ vraṃ vyomaghoraṃ bhramati bhuvanataḥ saptapātālatālaṃ
T01n893u_001:12: kraṃ kraṃ kraṃ kāmarūpaṃ dhadhakitadhakitaṃ tasya haste triśūlam |
T01n893u_001:13: druṃ druṃ druṃ durgarūpaṃ bhramati ca caritaṃ tasya dehasvarūpaṃ
T01n893u_001:14: maṃ maṃ maṃ mantrasiddhaṃ sakalabhayaharaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 3 ||
T01n893u_001:15: jhaṃ jhaṃ jhaṃkārarūpaṃ jhamati jhamajhamā jhaṃjhamānā samantāt
T01n893u_001:16: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃkāladhārī dhudhuritadhuritaṃ dhundhumārī kumārī |
T01n893u_001:17: dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūmravarṇā bhramati bhuvanataḥ kālapāstriśūlaṃ
T01n893u_001:18: taṃ taṃ taṃ tīvrarūpaṃ mama bhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 4 ||
T01n893u_001:19: raṃ raṃ raṃ rāyarudraṃ rurudhitarudhitaṃ dīrghajihvākarālaṃ
T01n893u_001:20: paṃ paṃ paṃ pretarūpaṃ samayavijayinaṃ sumbhadambhe nisumbhe |
T01n893u_001:22: hrīṃ hrīṃ hrīṃkāranāde bhavabhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 5 ||
T01n893u_001:25: paṅke jātābhijāte curu curu curute kāminī kāṇḍakaṇṭhe
T01n893u_001:26: kaṅkālī kālarātrī bhagavati varade siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 6 ||
T01n893u_001:28: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃ kālarūpaṃ ghughuritaghuritaṃ ghuṃ ghumā bindurūpī |
T01n893u_001:29: dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūṃ dhūmravarṇā bhramati bhuvanataḥ kālapāśatriśūlaṃ
T01n893u_001:30: taṃ taṃ taṃ tīvrarūpaṃ mama bhayaharaṇaṃ siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 7 ||
T01n893u_001:31: jhrīṃ jhrīṃ jhrīṃkāravṛnde pracaritamahasā vāmahaste kapālaṃ
T01n893u_001:32: khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ khaṅgahaste ḍamaruḍimaḍimāṃ muṇḍamālāsuśobhām |
T01n893u_001:33: ruṃ ruṃ ruṃ rudramālābharaṇavibhūṣitā dirghajihvā karālā
T01n893u_001:34: devi śrī ugracaṇḍī bhagavati varade siddhicaṇḍī namaste || 8 ||
